title: 服务器怎么做滚动字体
author: cchenge

replies.author: Liuziyangxfq
replies.txt_content:
不确定你是要全息那种在某处滚动的还是在屏幕上以公告的那种形式滚动的
以公告形式
VipJoinFlowView
以全息形式
Holographic Extension

replies.author: hunaoa
replies.txt_content:
你说的是那种在屏幕上滚动的公告吗，那个需要配合VV来运行的。
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

replies.author: Abraham511
replies.txt_content:
